author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of #33701. Additional condition to preserve nano v8 feature has been added on top of what was there in 33701. 
#### PR validation:
Validated with wf - 
- 136.8523: nanov9 wf - the Fall17V1 branches are dropped 
- 136.8522: nanov8 wf - the  Fall17V1 branches are kept.

cc @jainshilpi @mariadalfonso @gouskos
title: EGamma NanoAOD: Backport of removal of Fall17v1 variables from electron Table
